beer.beer_name: All I Want For Xmas Is True
beer.beer_description:
Imperial N.Z Pilsner dialled up to Xmas with sacks of Kiwi hops.
Welcome to your new festive alibi.
It could even get you out of helping with the dishes.*
*terms and conditions may apply

user.bio: Beer is the word. Now you know this, you can thank a yellow fuzz from Canberra for this.

items.badge_description: When a single isn’t enough, make it a double. Doubling the hops and malts in a recipe results in a higher ABV and can pack quite a boozey punch. That's 320 different beers with the style that contains Imperial / Double in its style name. Try 5 more for Level 65!

items.checkin_comment:
Carwyn Canvent 2025 #19:
Went down way too fast. Bursts of lemon, almost wheaty. Bubbly mouthfeel. Dry and crisp finish. Real good stuff.

items.badge_description: Light and crisp, a Pilsner is all you need to make your day great. Though, perhaps another one would make it even better. That’s 60 different Pilsners. Try 5 more for Level 13!

items.badge_description: You’ve unlocked today’s Recappd badge! Any drink you check in helps power your faction as we race toward choosing the next Untappd icon. Explore your year in beer at Recappd and come back tomorrow! Recappd is presented by Crescent Canna: Try the bestselling THC drinks in the country and get FREE THC gummies with your purchase. Add any THC drink to your cart and use code: GUMTAPPD. Shop Now >

What happens when you take two or more amazing breweries, throw them into the tank and let them ferment together? An amazing collaboration beer, that’s what! Cheers to working together to create the perfect flavor. That's 55 different beers that have been brewed as a collaboration. Try 5 more for Level 12!

items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That's 330 check-ins with a photo.  Try 5 more for Level 67!

Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 285 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 58! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast
Do you come from the land down under, where beer does flow, and men chunder? That's at least 285 different beers from Australia. Try 5 more for Level 58!
